title: Life along the waterways
creator_credit: Roy Wilcox, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and John A. Haeseler
brief_description: Depicts the many forms of plant and animal life found near the streams, of ponds, rivers and marshes that make up a waterway system. Illustrates the dependence of the members of this community on the waterway, and points out their activities throughout the spring, summer and autumn seasons. The film indicates the physical changes of the waterway in its growth from a brook to a river.
